candidate Profile Description.summary: Experienced Software and Data Engineer with a Master's in Computer Science. Proficient in Python, JavaScript, C++, SQL and more. Experienced in leading teams, developing software applications, and creating data pipelines. Proficient with tools like AWS S3, Jira, and Postman. Demonstrates ability to teach and co-founded a software development services venture.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
research: Machine Learning in Medical Robotics with Dr. Brown
Visualizing 3D UpSet plots with Dr. Lex

experience.title: Associate Consultant (Software and Data Engineer)
responsibilities: Led the development of a real-time fraud detection system to revolutionize the claims verification process for a national health insurance provider, reducing monthly claims losses by $4.8M and response time from hours to seconds.
Engineered stage-wise RESTful APIs to dynamically access multiple databases and get results parsed by the rule engine.
Developed an investigation portal for the case investigation team, enhancing efficiency in exploring cases and entity relations.

Created and optimized end-to-end data pipelines connecting multiple databases for daily ETL, streamlining processes and reducing loading time by 52% through the implementation of strategic indexing and incremental loading logic.
Guided and managed a dedicated team of five while fostering communication with clients for ongoing improvements, using Jira Kanban and standups to prioritize requirements.

experience.title: Trainee
responsibilities: Implemented a Bolt Module-based temperature monitoring system for a cooling chamber.
Engineered a Python-based alert system using Twilio API to broadcast chamber breach events.
Utilized z-score analysis to detect breaches, eliminating the need for light sensors, reducing system cost as a result.
Designed a dashboard with React to visualize real-time temperature changes, enabling proactive maintenance.

projects.name: Wotit - Share Your Favorites
projects.description: Developed Wotit, a web-app, using Next.js, TailwindCSS, MongoDB, and AWS S3, addressing the need for a platform to share personal favorites through a single link. Implemented login, settings, and visual analytics - enabling users to save profiles, edit their public page, and track page visits.

projects.name: MusicViz - History of Music Visualized
projects.description: Scraped and transformed two decades of Billboard Top 100 data with attribute information from Spotify API using Python. Developed and deployed dynamic visualizations using D3.js and Node.js, including spider charts, cluster plots, and heatmaps.

projects.name: Headphone Frequency Response Visualization Tool
projects.description: Developed a tool in Python for generating and comparing headphone frequency graphs, facilitating performance evaluations. Enhanced graph readability by fitting the data to a logarithmic scale and applying a Savitzky-Golay filter for data smoothing.

projects.name: Auto Time Tracking - Streamlining Workforce Management
projects.description: Engineered a robust and scalable solution to extract, clean, and update timesheet data from ClickUp to Google Sheets. Replaced 20 hours of weekly manual labor with the automated system, significantly enhancing operational efficiency.

projects.name: MorseGen - IoT Morse Code Converter
projects.description: Designed a text to morse code converter using the Bolt IoT module and a Flask-based web application for user interaction. Formulated a precise algorithm ensuring adherence to morse code rules, generating accurate API calls for timing-based legitimate morse code translation. User's choice: auditory or visual feedback via LED or buzzer.

involvement_and_contribution: Teaching Assistant for Digital System Design at the University of Utah, January 2024 - Present
Co-founded Cryvis, a freelance venture for software development services.
